Hero.Title: Schedule and Automate with Confidence
Hero.Subtitle: Powerful scheduling and automation platform for developers and businesses

HowItWorks.Title: How It Works
HowItWorks.Subtitle: Get started with Cronium in three simple steps

Step1.Title: Create Your Events
Step1.Description: Write your code or set up HTTP requests to perform tasks. Use any supported programming language.

Step2.Title: Set Up Schedules
Step2.Description: Choose when and how often your events should run using flexible scheduling options.

Step3.Title: Monitor Execution
Step3.Description: Track performance with detailed logs and receive notifications for success or failure.

Features.Title: Powerful Features
Features.Subtitle: Everything you need to automate and manage your scripts in one place

Overlay.Title: Intuitive Script Management
Overlay.Description: Create, edit, and monitor your scripts with our powerful yet easy-to-use interface

Scheduling.Title: Advanced Scheduling
Scheduling.Description: Schedule scripts to run at specific intervals or use custom cron expressions for complex timing needs.

EventTypes.Title: Multiple Script Types
EventTypes.Description: Support for Python, Node.js, and Bash scripts with a built-in code editor.

GitHub.Title: GitHub Integration
GitHub.Description: Store your scripts as GitHub Gists for version control and easy management.

RemoteExecution.Title: Remote Execution
RemoteExecution.Description: Run scripts locally or on remote servers via SSH connections.

Authentication.Title: Secure Authentication
Authentication.Description: Sign in with email, Google, or GitHub accounts with role-based permissions.

Notifications.Title: Custom Notifications
Notifications.Description: Configure webhooks and email notifications for script success or failure.

Logging.Title: Detailed Logging
Logging.Description: View comprehensive execution logs with timestamps and output details.

Retry.Title: Retry Mechanism
Retry.Description: Set automatic retries and timeout durations to ensure script reliability.

Feature1.Title: Powerful Scheduling
Feature1.Description: Schedule scripts and tasks using familiar cron expressions or simple intervals

Feature2.Title: Multiple Languages
Feature2.Description: Write scripts in Node.js, Python, or Bash - use the best tool for the job

Feature3.Title: Webhook Triggers
Feature3.Description: Trigger workflows via webhooks to integrate with external services

Feature4.Title: Comprehensive Logs
Feature4.Description: Detailed execution logs for all your scripts and workflows

MultiLanguage.Title: Multiple Languages
MultiLanguage.Description: Write scripts in Node.js, Python, or Bash - use the best tool for each job

FlexibleScheduling.Title: Flexible Scheduling
FlexibleScheduling.Description: Set up cron schedules, intervals, or one-time executions with ease

RemoteExecution.Title: Remote Execution
RemoteExecution.Description: Run scripts on remote servers securely using SSH connections

SecureEnvironment.Title: Secure Environment
SecureEnvironment.Description: Manage sensitive credentials with encrypted environment variables

EventDriven.Title: Event-Driven Workflows
EventDriven.Description: Chain scripts together to create complex automation workflows

ExecutionMonitoring.Title: Execution Monitoring
ExecutionMonitoring.Description: Track performance and receive alerts for failed executions

CTA.Title: Ready to start automating?
CTA.Description: Sign up for free and start building your first automation in minutes.
CTA.Community: Join our growing community of developers to share insights and automation recipes.

Documentation.Title: Documentation
Documentation.Description: Learn how to use Cronium to automate your scripts and workflows
